body.raw:
{ "schemaId": "Microsoft.Insights/activityLogs", "data": { "status": "Activated", "context": { "activityLog": { "channels": "Admin", "correlationId": "14d3fe00-8188-4b83-a3bf-3b5dcbdbda3f", "description": "Resolved: Azure Sentinel - Delays in Alert Generation - Mitigated", "eventSource": "ServiceHealth", "eventTimestamp": "2021-11-02T19:50:06.3684504+00:00", "eventDataId": "04a666ad-c98d-d632-c857-925b3ec02656", "level": "Warning", "operationName": "Microsoft.ServiceHealth/incident/action", "operationId": "14d3fe00-8188-4b83-a3bf-3b5dcbdbda3f", "properties": { "title": "Azure Sentinel - Delays in Alert Generation - Mitigated", "service": "Azure Sentinel", "region": "Global", "communication": "

Summary of impact: Between 07:00 and 16:00 UTC on 02 Nov 2021, you were identified as a customer using Azure Sentinel who may have experienced delays in alert generation.

\n

Preliminary Root Cause: We determined that a backend cluster had reached an operation threshold due to a recent update having unforeseen load on the cluster.

\n

Mitigation: We recovered some unhealthy nodes to increase the operational capacity as well as rolled back the recent deployment task to mitigate the issue. 

\n

Next steps: We will continue to investigate to establish the full root cause and prevent future occurrences. Stay informed about Azure service issues by creating custom service health alerts: https://aka.ms/ash-videos for video tutorials and https://aka.ms/ash-alerts for how-to documentation.

", "incidentType": "Incident", "trackingId": "CM35-TST", "impactStartTime": "2021-11-02T07:00:08.0000000Z", "impactMitigationTime": "2021-11-02T16:00:18.0000000Z", "impactedServices": "[{\"ImpactedRegions\":[{\"RegionName\":\"Global\"}],\"ServiceName\":\"Azure Sentinel\"}]", "impactedServicesTableRows": "\r\nAzure Sentinel\r\nGlobal
\r\n\r\n", "defaultLanguageTitle": "Azure Sentinel - Delays in Alert Generation - Mitigated", "defaultLanguageContent": "

Summary of impact: Between 07:00 and 16:00 UTC on 02 Nov 2021, you were identified as a customer using Azure Sentinel who may have experienced delays in alert generation.

\n

Preliminary Root Cause: We determined that a backend cluster had reached an operation threshold due to a recent update having unforeseen load on the cluster.

\n

Mitigation: We recovered some unhealthy nodes to increase the operational capacity as well as rolled back the recent deployment task to mitigate the issue. 

\n

Next steps: We will continue to investigate to establish the full root cause and prevent future occurrences. Stay informed about Azure service issues by creating custom service health alerts: https://aka.ms/ash-videos for video tutorials and https://aka.ms/ash-alerts for how-to documentation.

", "stage": "Resolved", "communicationId": "11000078603411", "isHIR": "false", "isSynthetic": "False", "impactType": "SubscriptionList", "version": "0.1.1" }, "status": "Resolved", "subscriptionId": "fb90284a-c631-42bb-be33-640977085952", "submissionTimestamp": "2021-11-02T19:50:06.8038565+00:00" } }, "properties": {} } }
